alert.note: Alert for Allamakee; Chickasaw; Clayton; Fayette; Winneshiek (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 09 at 9:39PM CDT by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeast Iowa and southwest Wisconsin through 1045 PM CDT... At 938 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Caledonia to near Sumner. Movement was east at 65 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Caledonia around 945 PM CDT. Brownsville around 950 PM CDT. West Union and Stoddard around 955 PM CDT. Elgin and Clermont around 1000 PM CDT. Postville and Coon Valley around 1005 PM CDT. Monona around 1015 PM CDT. Harpers Ferry around 1025 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by these storms include Volney, County Roads A 52 And W 60, Jersey Valley County Park, Eastman, Nordness, Giard, Quandahl, County 5 And Peyton Road, Highway 14 61 And County N and Chaseburg. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 100 AM CDT for northeastern Iowa. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch also remains in effect until 100 AM CDT for southwestern and west central Wisconsin.
